content:
Model Name	Manufacturer	Class/Type	Armor Value (front/side/rear)	Mobility/Speed (km/h or MA)	Weight (kg/tons)	Powerplant (type/range/endurance)	Armament (integrated, optional, carried weapons)	Systems/Upgrades (sensor suite, ECM, etc.)	Crew/Operator (number/type)	Required Stat/Skill (to pilot/use)	Cost (eb)	Availability (military, corporate, black market, etc.)	Special Notes (quirks, vulnerabilities, unique features)	Source (Maximum Metal page number)
Commando	Militech	Light	70/65/60	50 km/h; MA 5	400 kg	Fuel Cell/12 hrs	Right Arm: 20mm autocannon, Left Arm: 7.62mm MG, (optional) 40mm GL	Basic sensors, IR/UV, light ECM, chaff/smoke	1 (solo/pilot)	REF + Powered Armor	120,000	Military, Corporate, Black Market	Standard light infantry ACPA.	Maximum Metal p.82
Boris 1	SovOil	Heavy	120/100/100	35 km/h; MA 3	750 kg	Fuel Cell/8 hrs	Right Arm: 25mm autocannon, Left Arm: 14.5mm MG, (optional) missile pack	Advanced sensors, ECM suite, NBC sealed, chaff/smoke	1 (pilot)	REF + Powered Armor	240,000	Military, Corporate	High armor, limited mobility.	Maximum Metal p.84
Grasshopper	Arasaka	Special	40/40/30	90 km/h; MA 8	300 kg	High-Efficiency Fuel Cell/10 hrs	Integrated 5.56mm SMG, optional mini-missiles	Advanced stealth, sensor suite, jump jets, basic ECM	1 (solo/pilot)	REF + Powered Armor	140,000	Military, Corporate	High agility, jump capability, low armor.	Maximum Metal p.86
Standard B	IEC	Medium	90/80/75	40 km/h; MA 4	500 kg	Fuel Cell/10 hrs	Right Arm: 20mm autocannon, Left Arm: 7.62mm MG, (optional) flamethrower	Standard sensors, chaff/smoke, enhanced comms	1 (pilot)	REF + Powered Armor	180,000	Military, Corporate, Black Market	Common corporate ACPA.	Maximum Metal p.88
Nemesis	Petrochem	Heavy	150/120/110	28 km/h; MA 2	1,000 kg	Dual Fuel Cell/6 hrs	Right Arm: 30mm autocannon, Left Arm: 12.7mm HMG, (optional) rockets	Top-tier sensors, heavy ECM, NBC, chaff/smoke	1 (pilot)	REF + Powered Armor	360,000	Military, Corporate	Assault/anti-vehicle suit.	Maximum Metal p.90
Spider	Biotechnica	Special	50/40/40	60 km/h; MA 7	350 kg	Biofuel Cell/10 hrs	Integrated 10mm SMG, (optional) web grenades, cutters	Stealth, climbing gear, advanced sensors, basic ECM	1 (pilot)	REF + Powered Armor	150,000	Military, Corporate, Black Market	Expert climbing/mobility.	Maximum Metal p.92
